Row.Text: Units ignore terrain costs when moving into any tile with Hills, and may cross Mountains, taking 50 HP damage if they end a turn on a Mountain. No maintenance costs for improvements in Hills.

[COLOR_WARNING_TEXT](DE_DE text) [ENDCOLOR]Units ignore terrain costs when moving into any tile with Hills, and may cross Mountains, taking 50 HP damage if they end a turn on a Mountain. No maintenance costs for improvements in Hills.
